metadata.synopsis: AD on signpost in the shadow cursed lands. The road is twisted and broken, the sign is leaning at an odd angle, but you can still read that Moonrise is ahead on the West. If you will follow the road you will eventually hit the Town and Moonrise.

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *Chionthar Mountain Pass - East. Reithwin and Moonrise Towers - West.*
